events.title: BASSTATIC: Chapter One
events.subtitle: Born in Goa. Forged through 30+ gatherings across Thailand and Bali. Now rebooting with a fresh chapter.

artists.name: Roba Grow
artists.bio: Founder of Basstatic. 10+ years behind the decks, delivering modern soundsystem music across dubstep, jungle, and drum & bass. The driving force behind 30+ Basstatic gatherings from Thailand to Bali.

artists.name: Muvs
artists.bio: Producer and DJ with over a decade of experience. Versatile selector moving between UK garage, dubstep, jungle, and drum & bass. Expect deep grooves and unexpected transitions.

artists.name: Vokvi
artists.bio: DJ, professional surf photographer, and dedicated bass head. Known for digging deep into modern and experimental bass sounds â€” always finding the tracks you haven't heard yet.

mc.name: MC Nyoman
mc.bio: 15+ years on the mic. Raggamuffin style, raw energy. A true veteran who knows how to lift a dancefloor and keep it moving.
